Description.en: All players must immediately play a Stance card.
All players holding at least one Betrayal must raise their hands. You may swap any held Stance of yours for a Betrayal of their choice.
All players must immediately reveal their Cacophony cards. If there are 3 or fewer other Cacophony cards revealed, gain that many points. Otherwise, discard all your Action cards.
All other players discard two Action cards. If Joy is in play, double this effect.
You may play two Action cards immediately. If Misery has been played this round, you may play three Action cards immediately instead.
Cancel the effects of another player's Action.
